divs: Sighting DetailsI was going Deer hunting one morning and I was hunting near Paynes creek area of Hart county. I pulled into the land and was early. So i was sitting in my truck til closer to time to go into woods. I see a round object i thought was a star. I was watching it and notice it was moving from side to side. It came closer and closer. It floated in front of my truck for 15-20 mins. Then it slowly moved behind my truck while i kept my eyes on it. It finally got out of sit and I waited until daylight to go into the woods. A few days later I go back one morning and it was raining and saw the same thing just as before. A few days later I go back one morning and there is a big ditch next to where i park my truck. As i was pulling in I thought to myself that a friend of mine was there hunting also that morning because there was lights in the parking area. As i get closer the lights dim and go away. all that was there was a ditch. There is no other way out or in to the area. After that i quit hunting in the area and have not been back. There is no houses around the area. It was about tree top high.
Summary: Glowing orb floating in front of my truck and moved above and behind me.
